name: Snake HD
description:
Special Price Drop!!!


FEATURES:
- Includes both Modern and Classic Modes.
- Updated art with deforming grid.
- 1 Player mode with over 30 insane levels
- 2 Player VS Mode with over 15 different battle arenas.
- Use NITRO Boost to score big points.
- Glowing vector art style.

1 PLAYER:
The classic game of Snake re-envisioned for the iPad. Twist and turn your way through 30 intense levels, while you grow and score big points.

2 PLAYER BATTLE MODE:
Battle a foe in 2 Player VS. Mode made specifically for the iPad. Both players face off head-to-head as they eat to grow and then use their bodies to cut off their opponent. (Light Bike Style)


NO OTHER SNAKE GAME ON THE IPAD OFFERS THIS MUCH CONTENT!

THE BEST SNAKE GAME ON THE IPAD!!!
